metadata.synopsis: Huge cinematic showing start of the Shadow Siege. Jaheira assesses the situation with the players, urgently, as darkness takes over the inn. Then a legion of shadows tear the guards apart as everyone else flees, and the party emerges to fight.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Isobel is kidnapped, killed, or otherwise forcibly removed from Last Light, dispelling the protection around the inn.

98.context: CinematicNodeContext: Jaheira and player spot something overhead-- a ghoul flying with a KO Isobel in his arms from the balcony toward Moonrise.

24.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Protective barrier starts flickering and falling. Pockets of Shadow Blight rise around, suffocating the light.|InternalNodeContext: Isobel was defeated after Marcus summoned the Ghouls, but before they were all killed. Marcus is alive to abduct her.

41.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Screams sound from inside the inn as the area is consumed by darkness as the inside goes dark. Player and Jaheira run out of front doors of inn.

45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Jaheira and player spot something overhead-- Marcus flying with a KO Isobel in his arms from the balcony toward Moonrise.

85.speaker: Karlach
85.text: What were you thinking?! What are we doing here?
85.context: NodeContext: Player just committed an evil act (allowing Isobel to be kidnapped) and Karlach is aghast.

62.speaker: Wyll
62.text: Shit. This was your doing. All of it.
62.context: NodeContext: Player just committed an evil act (allowing Isobel to be kidnapped) and Wyll is aghast.

46.speaker: Gale
46.text: Behold, the consequences of your actions.

115.speaker: Jaheira
115.text: Isobel. No! What in the Nine Hells happened?!
115.context: CinematicNodeContext: Running into position after seeing the barrier shimmer and breakNodeContext: Subtext is that Isobel being captured spells death and doom for all remaining in the inn. Pause between 'Isobel, no!' and 'What the hells...' Jaheira is comprehending wtf happened and turns to the player for an explanation.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: She was my sacrifice. It was a delight.

56.speaker: Jaheira
56.text: You wretch! To think you had my trust. If this be my last act, let it be in service of strangling the life out of you.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Marcus was a True Soul. He said he was taking Isobel to Ketheric Thorm.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Marcus was a True Soul. He said he was taking Isobel to Ketheric Thorm, but he died in the attempt. One of his ghouls grabbed her instead.

43.speaker: Jaheira
43.text: And you had no idea? After Marcus vouched for you at the gate, he didn't confide in you?

65.speaker: Player
65.text: He did, but I decided to handle him myself.

86.speaker: Jaheira
86.text: You don't get to decide. Not here. Not while I'm responsible for the lives of the people at this inn.
86.context: NodeContext: Furious. The player made a bad call and now everyone is screwed. Not shouting; cold fury.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: He didn't - I had no idea.

16.speaker: Jaheira
16.text: I suppose I have no choice but to believe you.

103.speaker: Jaheira
103.text: Isobel is gone. Soon the shadows will wash us all away.

7.speaker: Jaheira
7.text: Listen closely, for there's very little time. Even if Last Light falls, you must destroy the cult of the Absolute.
7.context: NodeContext: desperate - recounting the story quickly and with urgency

84.speaker: Jaheira
84.text: Their leader is a man called Ketheric Thorm. He resides in Moonrise Towers, and we've found him to be impervious to the blade, and to magic to boot.

11.speaker: Jaheira
11.text: Even so, you must find him and you must kill him.

8.speaker: Jaheira
8.text: As impossible as that task sounds, there must be a way to break the spell that makes him invincible. There are secrets in this ancient waste, hidden from...
8.context: NodeContext: she's interrupted at the end

5.context: CinematicNodeContext: |Jaheria directs attention to something outside|

112.context: CinematicNodeContext: |In front of the inn, a generic Harper is the first to transform: He appears to suffocate, then falls, gasping and screaming; he contorts (strained exhalation as the life is squeezed out of him), and rises again covered in Shadow Blight.|

91.speaker: Jaheira
91.text: So it begins. So it will end.

70.speaker: Jaheira
70.text: It's happening. They'll all be taken by the shadows. Only by the grace of Isobel's spell will we be spared the same fate.

10.speaker: Jaheira
10.text: It's happening. They'll all be taken by the shadows.

54.speaker: Jaheira
54.text: For a little while longer, you and I are destined to fight side by side, but if the shades don't take you, I have the next claim on your head.

110.speaker: Jaheira
110.text: We cannot hesitate. Not even for those we knew - those we cared for. They're no longer who they were.

60.speaker: Jaheira
60.text: Steel your hearts and steady your hands. To battle!

57.speaker: Jaheira
57.text: Listen closely, for there's very little time. Even if Last Light falls, your mission does not change: you must find Ketheric Thorm and you must kill him.

59.speaker: Jaheira
59.context: NodeContext: Cold disdain. She's about to fight you.

92.speaker: Jaheira
92.text: I gave you my trust too easily, but with the same ease I swear I'll strike you down.
92.context: NodeContext: To her troops, elevated. About to start combat.

79.speaker: Jaheira
79.context: NodeContext: she's interrupted at the end

55.speaker: Player
55.text: There's no time for this. We have a shadow curse to deal with.

29.speaker: Jaheira
29.text: You're right. There's no stopping it now.

37.speaker: Jaheira
37.text: In this moment, you are the greater threat.

33.speaker: Player
33.text: He did. I thought it'd be fun to see what he had planned for you.

66.speaker: Jaheira
66.text: Blackguard! You're viler than the worm that's consuming you.
66.context: NodeContext: Fury; the player has admitted to being a traitor

51.speaker: Jaheira
51.text: Gods spare us. Ketheric was planning our demise all along.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I helped Marcus kidnap Isobel. And now I'm going to watch the shadows consume you.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: I was curious to see what you would do without her.

50.speaker: Player
50.text: The Absolute's forces happened. Now we know what we're up against.

3.speaker: Jaheira
3.text: I see little more than a cowardly deception at play.

64.speaker: Karlach
64.text: What were you thinking?! What are we doing here?
64.context: NodeContext: Player just committed an evil act (allowing Isobel to be kidnapped) and Karlach is aghast.

26.speaker: Wyll
26.text: Shit. This was your doing. All of it.

80.speaker: Jaheira
80.text: Isobel! No! What in the Nine Hells happened?

96.speaker: Player
96.text: It looks like some kind of terrible accident.

67.speaker: Player
67.text: It looks like one of our enemies got hold of her.

13.speaker: Jaheira
13.text: I don't see how she... Unless some cultist sneaked in, but gods, we'll be overrun!
13.context: NodeContext: Frustration, trying to make sense of this, but there's no time.

28.speaker: Player
28.text: There's no time for this, Jaheira; without Isobel, the shadows will overrun this place.

18.speaker: Jaheira
18.text: Liar! It was you who killed her.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: Isobel and I got into a little spat.

27.speaker: Jaheira
27.context: NodeContext: Jaheira's eyes harden. the player just admitted to killing Isobel

48.speaker: Jaheira
48.text: I can't believe I didn't see you for what you are. A murderer. You killed her, and in doing so you've spelled our doom.

23.speaker: Gale
23.text: Behold, the consequences of your actions.

101.context: InternalNodeContext: Outside shot, player runs outside.

90.speaker: Jaheira
90.text: Do you understand what you've done? Without Isobel, everyone in this inn is as good as dead!

109.speaker: Jaheira
109.text: I trusted you. Silvanus forgive me, I let you in.
